de.geofencing.client

Class GeofencingClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.geofencing.client.GeofencingClient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeofencingAdmin, GeofencingAdminLogin, GeofencingDevice

    public abstract class GeofencingClient
extends java.lang.Object
    GeofencingClient provides functions to implement a client for the geofencing system.
    Author:
    Markus Thral

    • Method Detail

      • setLogHandler

        public void setLogHandler(LogHandler logHandler)
        Sets LogHandler for processing LogEntries and errors, for example writing to a log-file
        Parameters:
        logHandler - LogHandler with the implemented instructions

      • setInfoHandler

        public void setInfoHandler(InfoHandler infoHandler)
        Sets InfoHandler for displaying information to the user
        Parameters:
        infoHandler - InfoHandler with the implemented instructions

      • onInfo

        public void onInfo(java.lang.String message)
        Shows message to the user via infoHandler and makes entry in Log via logHandler
        Parameters:
        message - Message to be shown and logged

      • getRestServiceURL

        public java.lang.String getRestServiceURL()

      • setServiceURL

        public void setServiceURL(java.lang.String restServiceURL)
        Sets up connection to the server with given URL Connection could be closed by setting to SERVICEURL_NOT_SET
        Parameters:
        restServiceURL - URL of the web service as String (i.e. https://127.0.0.1:8080/Geofencing)

      • allowAllCertificates

        public void allowAllCertificates()
        Allows to accept all certificates for the connection to the web service. Have to be called before start().

      • checkServiceURL

        public void checkServiceURL(java.lang.String restServiceURL)
        Checks if the given service URL is reachable. The set URL is not changed. Result is handled by the InfoHandler. Occurring errors will be handled by the LogHandler.
        Parameters:
        restServiceURL - URL of the web service as String (i.e. https://127.0.0.1:8080/Geofencing)

      • start

        public void start()
        Loads properties from memory if existing and sets up connection to the web service. If connected startInteractingWithServer is called. If called as GeofencingAdmin, make sure that the administrator password is set All used handler should be set before starting the client.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops interacting with server and scanning for beacons. Also bluetooth is deactivated.

      • isBtScanActive

        public boolean isBtScanActive()
        Returns status of the BeaconScanner
        Returns:
        true if scan is active, false if not

      • setScanPeriods

        public void setScanPeriods(int scanPeriod,
                           int scanWaitTime)
        Sets scanPeriod and wait-time between to scans
        Parameters:
        scanPeriod - Scan-time in milliseconds
        scanWaitTime - Time between to scans in milliseconds

      • setBeaconChangeHandler

        public void setBeaconChangeHandler(BeaconChangeHandler beaconChangeHandler)
        Sets BeaconChangeHandler for displaying or processing beacons in range
        Parameters:
        beaconChangeHandler - BeaconChangeHandler with the implemented function
